London named best city in the world for 2025 to visit or live https://www.nzherald.co.nz/travel/travel-news/london-named-best-city-in-the-world-for-2025-to-visit-or-live/6FPRRMUOCNDB3KYGVIUIK4YW7I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/travel/travel-news/london-named-best-city-in-the-world-for-2025-to-visit-or-live/6FPRRMUOCNDB3KYGVIUIK4YW7I/ Sarah PollokHowever, one NZ city did rank number one in a specific category. Rotorua crash: Serious injuries reported after crash on Hamurana Rd https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/rotorua-crash-serious-injuries-reported-after-crash-on-hamurana-rd/QOC2V2YYENGVNPLW65JUMGQBXM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/rotorua-daily-post/news/rotorua-crash-serious-injuries-reported-after-crash-on-hamurana-rd/QOC2V2YYENGVNPLW65JUMGQBXM/ Emergency services were notified about the single-vehicle crash about 1pm. Mon, 02 Dec 2024 00:24:36 +0000 Emergency services were called to the crash on Hamurana Rd about 1pm.
NZ’s first case of high pathogenic strain of bird flu found on Otago egg farm https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nzs-first-case-of-bird-flu-found-on-otago-egg-farm/7GU4CPBVARFWJDAOGKJGFUNSBM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nzs-first-case-of-bird-flu-found-on-otago-egg-farm/7GU4CPBVARFWJDAOGKJGFUNSBM/ Ministry acting quickly after H7N6 detected on farm in Otago. Mon, 02 Dec 2024 00:22:00 +0000 The Ministry for Primary Industries says the H7N6 strain is thought to have infected the Otago farm - after laying hens foraging outside the shed were exposed to a low pathogenic virus from wild waterfowl. Photo / 123rf
Christchurch charity boxing death: Inquest delves into safety of corporate and charity boxing events https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-charity-boxing-death-inquest-into-safety-of-corporate-and-charity-boxing-events/4SBPMG2MNZBP3FJ44P56T54A6Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/christchurch-charity-boxing-death-inquest-into-safety-of-corporate-and-charity-boxing-events/4SBPMG2MNZBP3FJ44P56T54A6Y/ Mike ThorpeKain Parsons died after injuries sustained in the ring in 2018. Kiwi Kids gather at Mount Maunganui for milestone Weet-Bix Kids TRYathlon https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/kiwi-kids-gather-at-mount-maunganui-for-milestone-weet-bix-kids-tryathlon/UAYRO35BK5HK7MKZOWYWKFMJEI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/kiwi-kids-gather-at-mount-maunganui-for-milestone-weet-bix-kids-tryathlon/UAYRO35BK5HK7MKZOWYWKFMJEI/ Kaitlyn MorrellA Thousand children swam, biked and ran hard participating in the Weet-Bix TRYathlon Sun, 01 Dec 2024 23:30:00 +0000 The Sanitarium Weet-Bix TRYathlon on Sunday in Mount Maunganui, hit a participant milestone of surpassing half a million participants. Photo / Sanitarium Weet-Bix Kids TRYathlon
Air New Zealand flight from Gisborne to Auckland turned around after engine issue https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/air-new-zealand-flight-from-gisborne-to-auckland-turned-around-after-engine-issue/BL22NSR4K5H65MS32EEN32JHMQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/air-new-zealand-flight-from-gisborne-to-auckland-turned-around-after-engine-issue/BL22NSR4K5H65MS32EEN32JHMQ/ The engine was shut down shortly after take off. Lil-Bouvalu Lyden named as teen rugby league player killed in Randwick Park crash https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lil-bouvalu-lyden-named-as-teen-rugby-league-player-killed-in-randwick-park-crash/XHCWA7DWFJAZNCAAQUYNDZUPGU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/lil-bouvalu-lyden-named-as-teen-rugby-league-player-killed-in-randwick-park-crash/XHCWA7DWFJAZNCAAQUYNDZUPGU/ Nazahryth BernardLil-Bouvalu Lyden had won a contract to play club rugby league and study in Australia. Sun, 01 Dec 2024 22:44:05 +0000 Lil-Bouvalu Lyden, who was killed in a crash in Randwick Park, had represented Tonga and Samoa in age-grade rugby league. Photo / Kau To’a Junior Academy NZ
